about_the_game:
Exertion is a rogue-like side-scroller game set in a dystopian future where technology is wielded for dark purposes. Take control of a high-tech robot as you face an army of drones, each programmed to destroy and equipped with unique abilities. As you eliminate the drones, you gain access to advanced technology that makes you even stronger. Combine these abilities to create a unique force and develop your own combat style.



Abilities


Surviving in this world requires not just strength but also intelligence. With strategic ability combinations, you can transform your robot into a durable tank or a death machine equipped with advanced technology to annihilate your enemies. Remember, technology is power—seize it and push the boundaries!





Bosses


The enemies you'll encounter on the battlefield are more than just ordinary foes. Born from the darkest corners of human technology, each one dominates its own territory and controls the battlefield. Defeating these enemies requires not only skill but also the strategic use of your abilities.



Traps


In this dystopian world, traps make survival an art. Death machines lurking in the shadows await their chance to strike like assassins. Vibrating electric wires are ready to turn you into ashes. Every corner, every dark nook becomes an arena where you must fight to survive.



Survive, grow stronger, and fight for revenge. Defeat your enemies in Exertion and become the warrior of the future!

Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
